ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900.
5 Megapixel Camera whit Video Capture; A2DP Bluetooth; Edge; Email Client; GPS / Location; High-Speed Data GPRS; Memory Card Slot; MP3; Speaker Phone; Touch Screen and Wi-Fi.
Dolby Mobile for Music; 3D S-Class UI; Sleek Metal & Tempered Glass; Impressive Screen Resolution; Touch Connectivity and Multi Format Dolby Mobile Sound.
Up to 4 hours of talk time, Up to 300 hours of standby time.
ProductInfo.Name: LG Arena KM900 Arena Unlocked Quad-Band Touch Screen Cell Phone with 5MP Camera, Bluetooth, gps navigation and Wi-Fi --International Version with Warranty (Pink)
